pullRequest.title: Add Baltop API

commit.message: Move API to its own class

nodes.bodyText: Should there be a linebreak before the @return here?
IMO this should be private to BalanceTop, and not exposed to plugins or /balancetop - both should wait on the async method.

Returning the results here makes it less clear to API callers what this does. I'd suggest that this method wraps calculateBalanceTopMap and returns a CompletableFuture<Void> that completes when done, then plugins can access the newly-updated cached baltop map from getBalanceTopCache.
Consider adding a timestamp that stores the last update time, so that plugins and /baltop can decide to update the cache based on when the last update occurred?
